Reference

Handling data and simulation

build_DAF_data()

Load all data for DAF analysis

generate_differences()

Generate artificial dataset with differences between 2 groups

generate_repeated_DAF_data()

Generate several dataset for DAF analysis

Processing

run_DAF_analysis()

Run differentially abundant features analysis.

select_process()

Select processing function to call

preprocess_DAF_data()

Filter DAF data

process_DESeq2()

Process the DAF analysis through the DESeq2 package

process_metagenomeSeq()

Process the DAF analysis through the metagenomeSeq package

process_ALDEx2()

Process the DAF analysis through the ALDEx2 package

process_edgeR()

Process the DAF analysis through the edgeR package

process_mbzinb()

Process the DAF analysis through the mbzinb package

process_RAIDA()

Process the DAF analysis through the RAIDA package

process_ZIBseq()

Process the DAF analysis through the ZIBseq package

process_voom()

Process the DAF analysis through the vomm method of the limma package

process_wilcox()

Process the DAF analysis through a wilcoxon test

Output and display

generate_curve_data()

Compute metrics needed for ROC and PR curves

curve_plot()

Plot a ROC or PR curve
